definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Blend oils and then add to a bowl of steaming water and inhale for five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 混合油，然后添加到一碗热气腾腾的水和吸入五分钟。

sentences.english: There\'s heat in the breathless August day already.
sentences.chinese: 没有一丝风的八月天，热气已经开始袭来。

sentences.english: Did someone tell you that the balloonist has arrived?
sentences.chinese: 有人告诉你那个热气球飞行家已经来了吗？

sentences.english: See the four of us and Chichi sitting in the basket of the hot-air balloon.
sentences.chinese: 瞧，我们四个人和奇奇正坐在热气球的篮子里。

sentences.english: The hot day air dispersed with the evenfall.
sentences.chinese: 白天的热气随着黄昏的到来而消散。

sentences.english: And later she would have a cup of hot coffee, coffee with cinnamon.
sentences.chinese: 然后再喝上一杯热气腾腾的咖啡，加了香料的那种。

sentences.english: Immediately upon formation, the fireball begins to grow rapidly and rise like a hot air balloon.
sentences.chinese: 火球在形成之后立刻迅速膨胀并上升，像热气球一样。

sentences.english: In winter, some people conserve energy by lowing the heat at night.
sentences.chinese: 冬天，为节约能源有些人在夜里把热气调小。

sentences.english: In all, the balloonists were active for a little under two years.
sentences.chinese: 总之，热气球在两年里并没有发挥很大的作用。

sentences.english: I saw the hot balloon standing up into the sky slowly.
sentences.chinese: 我看到热气球缓缓地升上了天空。

sentences.english: Get CLOSE UP of steaming water being poured.
sentences.chinese: 给倾倒中冒着热气的水特写。

sentences.english: In convection, hot currents flow upwards.
sentences.chinese: 在对流中热气流向上运动。

sentences.english: The heat reflected from the white sand formed a mirage.
sentences.chinese: 热气经白色的沙面反射形成了蜃景。

sentences.english: It looked at the cart of steaming hot bean cakes, people just want to pay.
sentences.chinese: 看着推车上那热气腾腾的豆糕，让人只想掏钱。

sentences.english: 1783 was the year people first flew in an hot-air balloon.
sentences.chinese: 1783年，人类第一次乘坐热气球飞行。

sentences.english: Kongming lanterns and hot-air balloons are based on the same principle.
sentences.chinese: 孔明灯和热气球，其实是一个原理。

definition: (of a vapor etc) to rise/to hang in the air
variant of 熱乎乎|热乎乎[re4 hu1 hu1]
